title: Top 13 Champions that has gone longest without a skin [05/23/2018]
body:
Many of the champions on the previous lists have finally gotten skins I think it's time for an update.
Props to Entropy Aether and Prankenstein for the last two lists.
Entropy Aether's list:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/EkAY8qnw-top-10-champions-that-has-gone-the-longest-without-a-skin-111416
Prankenstein's list:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/WKnjAkPf-top-10-champions-that-has-gone-longest-without-a-skin-080817

1) {{champion:6}}: 2,270 days || 6 years 2 months 19 days || Battlecast Urgot
2) {{champion:74}}: 1,409 days || 3 years 10 months 9 days || Hazmat Heimerdinger
3) {{champion:32}} & {{champion:77}}: 1,148 days || 3 years 1 month 21 days || Surprise Party Amumu & Definitely Not Udyr
4) {{champion:33}}, {{champion:72}}, & {{champion:101}}: 1,122 days || 3 years 26 days || Guardian of the Sands Rammus, Skarner, & Xerath.
5) {{champion:9}}: 1,119 days || 3 years 23 days || Risen Fiddlesticks
6) {{champion:26}}: 1,108 days || 3 years 12 days || Blood Moon Zilean
7) {{champion:82}} & {{champion:35}}: 1,098 days ||  3 years 2 days || King of Clubs Mordekaiser & Wild Card Shaco
8) {{champion:39}}: 1,084 days || 2 years 11 months 19 days || Order of the Lotus Irelia
9) {{champion:31}}: 1,078 days || 2 years 11 months 13 days || Prehistoric Cho'Gath
10) {{champion:421}}: 1,062 days || 2 years 10 months 27 days || Pool Party Rek'Sai

Statistics based off of [05/23/2018]

Like Entropy Aether and Prankenstein before me:
I am not saying that they need skins or anything.
If any of my information is wrong, please forgive me.
I do not count chromas.
The main intention of this post is to inform and update.

Thank You.
Edit: I know this is now 14 Champions but, I was informed that Shaco also hasn't gotten a skin since the high stakes skin series release.
